name: Suwa Moriya 64
description:
Suwako has once again misplaced all her precious rings, help her collect them. Finding them is easy, but getting to them with maximum combo is a challenge.

3D platforming in open ended levels, keep moving to keep the combo up, aim for the high rankings.

READ THIS FIRST:

- if the game doesn't start for some reason, try renaming openal32.dll to something else. playing without openal isn't recommended as audio can get very ugly otherwise.
- if you have trouble nailing jump combos, try holding jump before you land instead of pressing it after you land
